Interface AppProvider

ViewerProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDemo, ArchitectureStabilityDemo, ArtsColorTheoryDemo, CivilizationApp, CrisprDesignApp, CrystalStructureApp, DigitalLogicDemo, EarthquakeDemo, EconomicsGDPDemo, EconomicsMarketDemo, FluidDynamicsDemo, FormulaNotationDemo, GalaxyDemo, GaltonBoardDemo, GameOfLifeDemo, GeneticAlgorithmDemo, GeneticsDemo, GeographyGISDemo, GeometryBoardDemo, HistoryTimelineDemo, HumanBodyDemo, InterplanetaryTrajectoryDemo, KillerAppBase, KurzweilDemo, LinguisticsWordFreqDemo, LorenzDemo, LotkaVolterraDemo, LSystemDemo, MandelbrotDemo, MarketCrashApp, MatrixDemo, MechanicsDemo, MetamathDemo, MolecularViewerDemo, NewtonianMechanicsLabDemo, PandemicForecasterApp, PeriodicTableDemo, PeripheralsDemo, PhylogeneticTreeDemo, PlottingDemo, PoliticsVotingDemo, PsychologyReactionTestDemo, QuantumCircuitApp, RelativisticFlightDemo, ResistorColorCodeDemo, RigidBodyDemo, SequenceAlignmentDemo, SimulationDemo, SmartGridApp, SociologyNetworkDemo, SpeciesBrowserDemo, SpectrographDemo, SportsResultsDemo, StarSystemDemo, StellarSkyDemo, ThermodynamicsDemo, TitrationApp, UnitConverterDemo, VitalMonitorDemo
public interface AppProvider extends ViewerProvider
Provider interface for Demos and Applications. Distinguishes between educational demos and full applications.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isDemo()
    Returns true if this is a Demo, false if it is a full App.

    Methods inherited from interface ViewerProvider

    getCategory, getDescription, getName, show
